hero.headline2: Prove What You Know. Be Recognized.
hero.subtitle1: Don’t let your learning go unnoticed. Discover how Open Badges make your skills visible.

section1.longHelp: Open badges must include several required metadata fields such as the badge type, issue date, criteria, and achievement description. This ensures every badge is complete and verifiable.
section1.description: Identify the meta information that is crucial for a viable open badge.

section2.description: As you collect various badges that prove different competences, combining them leads to major Meta badges.

section3.description: Through different forms of learning you improve in different sets of skills. Some of them are hard skills - like calculus, and some of them are soft skills like communication. Assign the cards as you best see fit.
